about_the_game:
Attention! This early demo may contain bugs and has only been tested on Oculus Quest 3. Compatibility with other headsets is not guaranteed yet. It does not represent the final game quality, and many aspects may change by release.

Join the fight for humanity’s survival in IRON GUARD: Salvation, an exhilarating Tower Defense game with real-time strategy elements. Build powerful defensive structures, upgrade your turrets, and directly engage with relentless waves of robots using your handheld drone. Only your tactical brilliance and battle-hardened strategies can save humanity across battles waged on different planets—including the hostile world of Akris.


Story:


Years after the Avalon crew was saved from the sentient planet Akris, a new threat emerges as multiple planets across our solar system come under attack. Once harmless, the terraforming machines have turned hostile under Akris's control, threatening human existence. Lead the defense, repel the onslaught across diverse worlds, and uncover the secrets of Akris. Prepare for intense battles both on distant planets and the enigmatic world of Akris itself, and rise as humanity’s last salvation.

Key Features:

  • Fast-paced and dynamic gameplay – each battle feels unique as enemies adapt their tactics.

  • Multiple modes and various mechanics – offering limitless replayability.

  • Formidable foes – each enemy tests your skills with distinct tactics, demanding strategic precision.

  • Resource management and upgrades – level up your turrets and drones to handle escalating threats. Optimize your operations with harvesters, minerals and factories to ensure a steady flow of resources and build your ultimate defense.

  • Command heroes with unique abilities and devastating superweapons to shift the balance of power.

  • 30 levels set across various planets and the mysterious world of Akris – face new obstacles and strategic opportunities in every corner of the galaxy.

  • Tactical control – command the battlefield from above like a master strategist, or shrink into the action and experience the thrill of a giant's world.

  • Arsenal of Tactical Possibilities - choose from 25+ various turrets. Take control of movable platforms to adapt your defenses dynamically, deploy devastating superweapons and much more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2/3/Pro (Link or Air Link)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2/3/Pro (Link or Air Link)

short_description: Step into the world of IRON GUARD: Salvation, a sci-fi Tower Defense game with real-time strategy elements. Build your defenses, upgrade turrets, and fend off waves of relentless robots with your handheld drone - your tactical brilliance is humanity’s last hope!
